comment: Disagree entirely with the previous posts. Dr. Allen is an excellent professor, who is very knowledgeable. He expects you to participate in discussions and be in class. Yes, his tests are short answer, but as long as you have paid attention, and use the study guide, you will be fine. Recommend to any and all.
